content: If you clone https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf.git, go to collector/benchmarks/webrender, then run cargo check, if fails to build because of some code in url 1.5.1. So just wondering, but how is it tested in the perf suite?

cargo check is probably building more than perf does; cargo check --manifest-path webrender/Cargo.toml is closer to perf invocation. In general it's recommended to build benchmarks through the collector.
